title: Ubisoft Confirms Cross-Generation Games - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.31.19
description:
Right now, go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box.

Quip starts at just $25 and you’ll get your first refill FREE at http://getquip.com/games.

Imran and Greg talk about five AAA Ubi games being on this gen and next gen, Nintendo numbers, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:10:40 - Housekeeping
TODAY is Halloween Hellscape. Halloween at 4PM. Youtube premiere on youtube.com/kindafunnygames
Extra Life is Saturday 11/2! 24 hours of games for charity! Join us now at kindafunny.com/extralife or watch on the day!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:12:20 - Ubi’s Q2 Call Tidbits…
00:29:20 - Nintendo News…
00:38:40 - I still wanted to share my story with the best friends, to show the world Dreams CAN be a success - Aku Hitsuji
00:48:09 - PS Now Hits a Million Subs, Brendan Sinclair GIB
00:51:35 - With XBox Game Pass and PlayStation Now getting more popular, do you think those monthly free "Games with Gold" and PS Plus will disappear? - BJ Bernardo
00:55:15 -  ESCAPE THE INVASION
00:56:42 - QUIP
00:58:20 - Out today
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
